sub_workout_group.name: Hyper Agility & Reflex Training
sub_workout_group.description: Elite agility training to enhance reaction time, movement efficiency, and acrobatics.

sub_workouts.name: Wall Run & Vault
sub_workouts.description: Sprint toward a wall, run up it, and vault over.

sub_workouts.name: Bullet-Dodge Reflex Training
sub_workouts.description: Dodge moving objects fired at high speed using predictive movement.

sub_workouts.name: Double Backflip Precision Landing
sub_workouts.description: Perform a double backflip with precision landing on small platforms.

sub_workouts.name: Super Speed Reaction Drill
sub_workouts.description: React to sudden light signals by sprinting in different directions at maximum speed.

sub_workouts.name: High-Speed Parkour Course
sub_workouts.description: Navigate a high-difficulty parkour course as fast as possible.

sub_workouts.name: Superhuman Ledge Grab Pull-Up
sub_workouts.description: Leap up to a ledge, grab it, and perform a controlled pull-up.

sub_workouts.name: Explosive Sprint Start Training
sub_workouts.description: Accelerate to top speed from a stationary position as quickly as possible.

sub_workouts.name: Aerial Cartwheel to Precision Landing
sub_workouts.description: Perform an aerial cartwheel and land on a small target area.

sub_workouts.name: 360° Obstacle Evasion
sub_workouts.description: Dodge and weave through randomly moving obstacles at full speed.

sub_workouts.name: Reactive Explosive Jump Drill
sub_workouts.description: Jump in different directions based on random light or sound cues.

sub_workouts.name: Rapid Fire Evasion Footwork
sub_workouts.description: Perform high-speed footwork patterns while dodging incoming projectiles.

sub_workouts.name: Extreme Angle Wall Climb
sub_workouts.description: Climb a 60° or steeper wall using parkour techniques.

sub_workouts.name: Spider Reflex Drill
sub_workouts.description: Use full-body agility to reactively jump, flip, or evade without warning.

sub_workouts.name: Ceiling Hang & Traverse
sub_workouts.description: Hang from a horizontal bar and traverse sideways without dropping.

sub_workouts.name: Rolling Escape Tactics
sub_workouts.description: Roll out of falls or attacks and transition seamlessly into a sprint or vault.

sub_workouts.name: Blindfolded Parkour Course
sub_workouts.description: Navigate an obstacle course with limited vision using spatial awareness.

sub_workouts.name: Explosive Directional Change Sprints
sub_workouts.description: Sprint at full speed, stop on command, and change direction instantly.

sub_workouts.name: Precision Footwork on Unstable Terrain
sub_workouts.description: Run across narrow or shifting surfaces without losing balance.

sub_workouts.name: Dual-Wall Parkour Sprint
sub_workouts.description: Sprint using alternating foot plants on two parallel walls.

sub_workouts.name: High-G Reflex Training
sub_workouts.description: React to multiple high-speed stimuli under gravitational resistance.

sub_workouts.name: Rooftop Sprint & Leap
sub_workouts.description: Sprint across an elevated platform and leap across a gap.

sub_workouts.name: Momentum Swing & Grab
sub_workouts.description: Swing from one handhold to another at maximum speed and precision.

sub_workouts.name: Dynamic Mid-Air Direction Shift
sub_workouts.description: Jump forward and change direction mid-air before landing.

sub_workouts.name: Super Sprint Vault to Roll
sub_workouts.description: Sprint at full speed, vault over an obstacle, and roll into a sprint.

sub_workouts.name: Superhero Dive Roll
sub_workouts.description: Leap forward into a rolling landing to absorb high-impact falls.
